QuestData.Title: The Red Market
QuestData.Description:
You came with de Princess Talanji?
I need a hand with a most unsavory task. Crimson cultists have made demselves a market for blood magic. Dis is bad, mon. Dis is very bad indeed.
I need you to go down dese steps and bring back any evidence you can of blood practices. And destroy their chalice. Big chalice. Don't forget de chalice.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Dark Fetishes and destroy the Chalice of Calling.
